verses.text: O give \w thanks|strong="H3034"\w* unto the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, for \add he is\add* \w good|strong="H2896"\w*: for his \w mercy|strong="H2617"\w* \add endureth\add* for \w ever|strong="H5769"\w*.

Let the \w redeemed|strong="H1350"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w say|strong="H0559"\w* \add so\add*, whom he hath \w redeemed|strong="H1350"\w* from the \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* of the \w enemy|strong="H6862"\w*;

And \w gathered|strong="H6908"\w* them out of the \w lands|strong="H0776"\w*, from the \w east|strong="H4217"\w*, and from the \w west|strong="H4628"\w*, from the \w north|strong="H6828"\w*, and from the \w south|strong="H3220"\w*.\f + \fr 107.3 \ft south: Heb. sea\f*

They \w wandered|strong="H8582"\w* in the \w wilderness|strong="H4057"\w* in a \w solitary|strong="H3452"\w* \w way|strong="H1870"\w*; they \w found|strong="H4672"\w* no \w city|strong="H5892"\w* to \w dwell|strong="H4186"\w* in.
\w Hungry|strong="H7457"\w* and \w thirsty|strong="H6771"\w*, their \w soul|strong="H5315"\w* \w fainted|strong="H5848"\w* in them.

Then they \w cried|strong="H6817"\w* unto the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* in their \w trouble|strong="H6862"\w*, \add and\add* he \w delivered|strong="H5337"\w* them out of their \w distresses|strong="H4691"\w*.

And he led them \w forth|strong="H1869"\w* by the \w right|strong="H3477"\w* \w way|strong="H1870"\w*, that they might \w go|strong="H3212"\w* to a \w city|strong="H5892"\w* of \w habitation|strong="H4186"\w*.

Oh that \add men\add* would \w praise|strong="H3034"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \add for\add* his \w goodness|strong="H2617"\w*, and \add for\add* his wonderful \w works|strong="H6381"\w* to the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w men|strong="H0120"\w*!

For he \w satisfieth|strong="H7646"\w* the \w longing|strong="H8264"\w* \w soul|strong="H5315"\w*, and \w filleth|strong="H4390"\w* the \w hungry|strong="H7457"\w* \w soul|strong="H5315"\w* with \w goodness|strong="H2896"\w*.

Such as \w sit|strong="H3427"\w* in \w darkness|strong="H2822"\w* and in the shadow of \w death|strong="H6757"\w*, \add being\add* \w bound|strong="H0615"\w* in \w affliction|strong="H6040"\w* and \w iron|strong="H1270"\w*;

Because they \w rebelled|strong="H4784"\w* against the \w words|strong="H0561"\w* of \w God|strong="H0410"\w*, and \w contemned|strong="H5006"\w* the \w counsel|strong="H6098"\w* of the most \w High|strong="H5945"\w*:

Therefore he brought \w down|strong="H3665"\w* their \w heart|strong="H3820"\w* with \w labour|strong="H5999"\w*; they fell \w down|strong="H3782"\w*, and \add there was\add* none to \w help|strong="H5826"\w*.

Then they \w cried|strong="H2199"\w* unto the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* in their \w trouble|strong="H6862"\w*, \add and\add* he \w saved|strong="H3467"\w* them out of their \w distresses|strong="H4691"\w*.

He brought them \w out|strong="H3318"\w* of \w darkness|strong="H2822"\w* and the shadow of \w death|strong="H6757"\w*, and \w brake|strong="H5423"\w* their \w bands|strong="H4147"\w* in \w sunder|strong="H5423"\w*.

Oh that \add men\add* would \w praise|strong="H3034"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \add for\add* his \w goodness|strong="H2617"\w*, and \add for\add* his wonderful \w works|strong="H6381"\w* to the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w men|strong="H0120"\w*!

For he hath \w broken|strong="H7665"\w* the \w gates|strong="H1817"\w* of \w brass|strong="H5178"\w*, and \w cut|strong="H1438"\w* the \w bars|strong="H1280"\w* of \w iron|strong="H1270"\w* in \w sunder|strong="H1438"\w*.
\w Fools|strong="H0191"\w* \w because|strong="H1870"\w* of their \w transgression|strong="H6588"\w*, and because of their \w iniquities|strong="H5771"\w*, are \w afflicted|strong="H6031"\w*.

Their \w soul|strong="H5315"\w* \w abhorreth|strong="H8581"\w* all manner of \w meat|strong="H0400"\w*; and they draw \w near|strong="H5060"\w* unto the \w gates|strong="H8179"\w* of \w death|strong="H4194"\w*.

Then they \w cry|strong="H2199"\w* unto the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* in their \w trouble|strong="H6862"\w*, \add and\add* he \w saveth|strong="H3467"\w* them out of their \w distresses|strong="H4691"\w*.
He \w sent|strong="H7971"\w* his \w word|strong="H1697"\w*, and \w healed|strong="H7495"\w* them, and \w delivered|strong="H4422"\w* \add them\add* from their \w destructions|strong="H7825"\w*.

Oh that \add men\add* would \w praise|strong="H3034"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \add for\add* his \w goodness|strong="H2617"\w*, and \add for\add* his wonderful \w works|strong="H6381"\w* to the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w men|strong="H0120"\w*!

And let them \w sacrifice|strong="H2076"\w* the \w sacrifices|strong="H2077"\w* of \w thanksgiving|strong="H8426"\w*, and \w declare|strong="H5608"\w* his \w works|strong="H4639"\w* with \w rejoicing|strong="H7440"\w*.\f + \fr 107.22 \ft rejoicing: Heb. singing\f*

They that go \w down|strong="H3381"\w* to the \w sea|strong="H3220"\w* in \w ships|strong="H0591"\w*, that \w do|strong="H6213"\w* \w business|strong="H4399"\w* in \w great|strong="H7227"\w* \w waters|strong="H4325"\w*;
These \w see|strong="H7200"\w* the \w works|strong="H4639"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, and his \w wonders|strong="H6381"\w* in the \w deep|strong="H4688"\w*.

For he \w commandeth|strong="H0559"\w*, and \w raiseth|strong="H5975"\w* the \w stormy|strong="H5591"\w* \w wind|strong="H7307"\w*, which lifteth \w up|strong="H7311"\w* the \w waves|strong="H1530"\w* thereof.\f + \fr 107.25 \ft raiseth: Heb. maketh to stand\f*

They mount \w up|strong="H5927"\w* to the \w heaven|strong="H8064"\w*, they go \w down|strong="H3381"\w* again to the \w depths|strong="H8415"\w*: their \w soul|strong="H5315"\w* is \w melted|strong="H4127"\w* because of \w trouble|strong="H7451"\w*.

They reel to and \w fro|strong="H2287"\w*, and \w stagger|strong="H5128"\w* like a drunken \w man|strong="H7910"\w*, and are at their \w wits’|strong="H2451"\w* \w end|strong="H1104"\w*. \f + \fr 107.27 \ft are…: Heb. all their wisdom is swallowed up\f*

Then they \w cry|strong="H6817"\w* unto the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* in their \w trouble|strong="H6862"\w*, and he bringeth them \w out|strong="H3318"\w* of their \w distresses|strong="H4691"\w*.
He \w maketh|strong="H6965"\w* the \w storm|strong="H5591"\w* a \w calm|strong="H1827"\w*, so that the \w waves|strong="H1530"\w* thereof are \w still|strong="H2814"\w*.
Then are they \w glad|strong="H8055"\w* because they be \w quiet|strong="H8367"\w*; so he \w bringeth|strong="H5148"\w* them unto their \w desired|strong="H2656"\w* \w haven|strong="H4231"\w*.

Oh that \add men\add* would \w praise|strong="H3034"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \add for\add* his \w goodness|strong="H2617"\w*, and \add for\add* his wonderful \w works|strong="H6381"\w* to the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w men|strong="H0120"\w*!

Let them \w exalt|strong="H7311"\w* him also in the \w congregation|strong="H6951"\w* of the \w people|strong="H5971"\w*, and \w praise|strong="H1984"\w* him in the \w assembly|strong="H4186"\w* of the \w elders|strong="H2205"\w*.
He \w turneth|strong="H7760"\w* \w rivers|strong="H5104"\w* into a \w wilderness|strong="H4057"\w*, and the \w watersprings|strong="H4325"\w* into dry \w ground|strong="H6774"\w*;

A \w fruitful|strong="H6529"\w* \w land|strong="H0776"\w* into \w barrenness|strong="H4420"\w*, for the \w wickedness|strong="H7451"\w* of them that \w dwell|strong="H3427"\w* therein.\f + \fr 107.34 \ft barrenness: Heb. saltiness\f*

He \w turneth|strong="H7760"\w* the \w wilderness|strong="H4057"\w* into a \w standing|strong="H0098"\w* \w water|strong="H4325"\w*, and \w dry|strong="H6723"\w* \w ground|strong="H0776"\w* into \w watersprings|strong="H4325"\w*.
And there he maketh the \w hungry|strong="H7457"\w* to \w dwell|strong="H3427"\w*, that they may \w prepare|strong="H3559"\w* a \w city|strong="H5892"\w* for \w habitation|strong="H4186"\w*;

And \w sow|strong="H2232"\w* the \w fields|strong="H7704"\w*, and \w plant|strong="H5193"\w* \w vineyards|strong="H3754"\w*, which may \w yield|strong="H6213"\w* \w fruits|strong="H6529"\w* of \w increase|strong="H8393"\w*.

He \w blesseth|strong="H1288"\w* them also, so that they are \w multiplied|strong="H7235"\w* \w greatly|strong="H3966"\w*; and \w suffereth|strong="H4591"\w* not their \w cattle|strong="H0929"\w* to \w decrease|strong="H4591"\w*.
Again, they are \w minished|strong="H4591"\w* and brought \w low|strong="H7817"\w* through \w oppression|strong="H6115"\w*, \w affliction|strong="H7451"\w*, and \w sorrow|strong="H3015"\w*.

He \w poureth|strong="H8210"\w* \w contempt|strong="H0937"\w* upon \w princes|strong="H5081"\w*, and causeth them to \w wander|strong="H8582"\w* in the \w wilderness|strong="H8414"\w*, \add where there is\add* no \w way|strong="H1870"\w*.\f + \fr 107.40 \ft wilderness: or, void place\f*

Yet setteth he the \w poor|strong="H0034"\w* on \w high|strong="H7682"\w* from \w affliction|strong="H6040"\w*, and \w maketh|strong="H7760"\w* \add him\add* \w families|strong="H4940"\w* like a \w flock|strong="H6629"\w*.\f + \fr 107.41 \ft from: or, after\f*

The \w righteous|strong="H3477"\w* shall \w see|strong="H7200"\w* \add it\add*, and \w rejoice|strong="H8055"\w*: and all \w iniquity|strong="H5766"\w* shall \w stop|strong="H7092"\w* her \w mouth|strong="H6310"\w*.

Whoso \add is\add* \w wise|strong="H2450"\w*, and will \w observe|strong="H8104"\w* these \add things\add*, even they shall \w understand|strong="H0995"\w* the \w lovingkindness|strong="H2617"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*.
